nodes.text: Viella Zall was a singer on the HoloNet galactic communications grid. Using local wildlife, Dalan Reid contructed replicas of Zall in the dozens. Reid's work began after he spent twelve years in isolation, becoming increasingly mentally imbalanced due to the illegality of his job as a veteran identity slicer. The slicer used the replicas for a spontaneous concert on the planet Tatooine, where he was apprehended by 3630 BBY.

Viella Zall was mentioned in the Codex entry for Identity Slicers in the 2015 expansion Knights of the Fallen Empire to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic by the company BioWare.
